title: MarketWatch - How to Save on Summer Travel
description: It's the summer for revenge travel, as many Americans plan long-awaited vacations with many COVID restrictions now lifted. MarketWatch personal-finance reporter Jacob Passy chats with NerdWallet travel and credit card expert Sara Rathner on how travelers can save money on their next getaway.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
